revision.text: {| class="wikitable" style="text-align: center;" |- ! Challenge !! Ribbon !! Recommended !! Requirements |- | Regional Attack Debuff || [[File:RegionalAttackDebuff.png|30px]]|| Yes || Lowers Pokémon attack based on native region and highest reached region. (See [[Regions]] for the debuffs) |- | Require Complete Pokédex || [[File:RequireCompletePokedex.png|30px]]|| Yes || Requires a complete regional pokédex before moving on to the next region. (See each [[Regions]] page for more) |- | No Click Attack ||[[File:DisableClickAttack.png|30px]]|| No || Prevents clicking on Pokémon to deal damage. |- | No Battle Item || [[File:DisableBattleItems.png|30px]]|| No || Prevents the use of the 6 [[Battle Items]] or the 6 [[Flutes]]. |- | No Master Ball || [[File:DisableMasterballs.png|30px]]|| No || Prevents the use of [[Master Ball|Master Balls]]. |- | No Oak Item || [[File:DisableOakItems.png|30px]]|| No || Prevents the use of [[Oak Items]]. |- | No Gem || [[File:DisableGems.png|30px]]|| No || Prevents the use of [[Gems]] and [[Flutes]]. |- | No Protein || [[File:DisableProteins.png|30px]]|| No || Prevents the use of [[Protein|Proteins]]. |- | Slow EVs ||[[File:SlowEVs.png|30px]]|| No || Diminishes the rate at which [[Pokérus|EVs]] are gained, 10x slower. |- | Real Evolutions || [[File:RealEvolutions.png|30px]]|| No || Your Pokémon go away when they evolve. |}
